\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 5072}

\subsection*{Slight Benzo Tingle}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Anonymous}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 10 mg & insufflated & Pharms - Temazepam & powder / crystals\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

I've enjoyed 10 mg crushed temazepam, in the nose. I get a slight tingle in the sinuses, not too bad, non noticable drip, pleasant and smooth.



I get mild visual and audio effects, perhaps as strong as a good bowl of herb, or 2-3 drinks, but in that benzo way. I'll probably repeat this.

\end{document}
